website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy stackable planter holds 15 plants in all and works much better as a standing solution than a hanging one.
pros: 5 stackable polypropylene tiers, capable of holding 15 plants in all
Can also be used as a hanger
Works well for herbs, succulents, vegetables, and strawberries
cons: The chain that comes with it is not that strong
this option is better as a standing planter

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it but......
customer_reviews.text: I truly wanted to love this pot but it held water terribly so I had to transplant everything out it. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: PCF

customer_reviews.title: Small but fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with how nice this looked and how easy it was to assemble. I am using this to plant a little herb garden. This is a bit smaller than I was expecting but it is still a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chipper

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart and water pools
customer_reviews.text: The water does not trickle down. Instructions say to plant first then add the chain.... Makes a big mess. Getting the chain through the starch is challenging. The stopper piece for the end of the chain does not work. Instructions for the stopper are vague. Too heavy for the hook. Cannot move easily because nothing is holding the trays together. Plant it where it's going to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I planted some of my Hens & Chicks in the tier planter and they are doing well (see picture). It takes up very little space and looks very good. It took a lot more potting soil than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb

customer_reviews.title: Great use of space!
customer_reviews.text: I was about to make a little herb garden in the backyard but a friend recommended me look at a vertical planter to save space so that's exactly what I did! I'm really glad I went this route so I didn't have to tear up the yard plus it was a fun project for the kids! Honestly its just a way better use of space.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for herbs
customer_reviews.text: My herbs are growing great issue is that I ordered the white/cream in picture (which I would have preferred) but received the orange.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for an indoor herb garden. It does have a tendency to over flow at the bottom if you over water. The water travels down level to level so my son over watered each level a little and then had a flood at the bottom in a few minutes. Once you figure that out it works great!
customer_reviews.author: TigerCoachTy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put all my succulents in to avoid having pots everywhere. Paired with a plant light, it's perfect for a little indoor garden
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble but has strong odor that doesn't seem to get away. We were planning to plant starwberries, but feel very uncomfortable doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Really solid materials! Even though it's a type of plastic, it doesn't feel cheap. It's quite sturdy. Happy I bought this as a birthday gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Stackable vertical planter.
customer_reviews.text: This vertical planter is great for growing herbs and various plants. I loaded mine with strawberries, some basil and culantro. Cant wait for strawberries to start producing. I did not use the chain and hook as i cant see it holding the weight of all trays but i assume if you use 2 trays there will be no issues. I like the color it comes in beige not the typical terracotta color. Very nice product would absolutely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for herbs during winter
customer_reviews.text: Love this planter. I started herbs from seeds a few weeks so I can have some indoor herbs for the winter. Great planter - I put this out when its warm enough (not stacked) so the plant/seeds get some sun then bring it in when it gets too cold (stacked). I cannot wait to have herbs for cooking and for tea during the cold weather months.
customer_reviews.author: Chie

customer_reviews.title: Small individual planters but perfect for herbs
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. The planters are a little small on the sides but fine for what we wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a single plant per opening
customer_reviews.text: Using this to start seeds, but better for a single plant per opening. Need to rotate to ensure even sun. Remember that where the trays stack will not get sunlight. Wish each tray was about 25% bigger. But definitely useful in small space.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup - worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at tower gardens and I'm glad I found these. Smaller than the tower garden but still suits my needs for a LOT less money. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Survey mom

customer_reviews.title: Buying more! Love it
customer_reviews.text: There were other tears the same size for more money on Amazon and I got this one and I will buy a second and third one it’s so sturdy it’s so pretty I absolutely love it I actually think that one is better than the ones that are more expensive
customer_reviews.author: MrsAmazon

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Great planter. I bought it to grow herbs. I needed a planter that didn't take up much space. This planter is just perfect. I will now have fresh herbs all winter. Just need this planter and a sunny window.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saving. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well for my basil and my mint plants. I don't have a lot of planters sitting around anymore because this five level planter eliminated that. It's easy enough to turn it around so that each day another part of the plant is getting sun.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and beautiful for gardening anywhere
customer_reviews.text: The 5-tier garden can be used stacked or separated. Be ready to use your intuition and Google (if needed) for assembling (no instructions included). I filled the garden tower with cuttings from my garden, some from a friend’s garden, and finished off with a few from the local nursery. The final product was a gift for family members who live in a condo to encourage them to become urban gardeners in celebration of the 50th Earth Day 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Moody

customer_reviews.title: Buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! This was super easy to assemble and looks great on my patio of my apartment. It’s small but not too small and there is room for each plant! The quality is also great! I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Allexis

customer_reviews.title: Wish-Washy
customer_reviews.text: I’m wish-washy on this product. It’s smaller than I expected though the dimensions are shown on the product description. I tried planting spices in it; not a good use. Currently, it’s loaded up with flowers that trail and vine. That’s nice. The product itself is not visible. Rather, I see a lovely spray of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy you get what you see.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Mine is currently filled with 2 tiers of strawberries, 1 of cherry tomatoes, 1 of peppers and the bottom with zucchini. Everything seems to be growing well!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Rhamy

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Complete
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the product and I’m extremely excited to use it to plant herbs in the upcoming growing season. However, the company forgot to give me one of the soil separators which isn’t the biggest deal because I plant things quite often without using an insert like that, but it would have been nice to have the whole product.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect planters
customer_reviews.text: I love theses planters! I had such beautiful blooming begonias this year that I didn't want to lose them to frost and winter weather, so I planted them in the stacking and brought them indoors to my sun room so I could enjoy them longer.
customer_reviews.author: sewcrafty

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced stackable planter
customer_reviews.text: Good stackable planters for the price. Drainage is not the best and one should widen the holes a bit to prevent soil from stopping them up.
customer_reviews.author: brandon miller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, love it
customer_reviews.text: This planter is awesome. I love it and it is now full of herbs.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stackable planter
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been a week since I planted my herb garden and I absolutely love it. Great for small patios/balcony area. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Cita9

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very easy to use and it looks great again. More importantly, it is made in the USA. I want to buy another one but it is not available from amazon and amazon keeps pushing made in China stuff. I don’t want to buy made in China anything, Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: South Texas

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little planter.
customer_reviews.text: It sits very nicely in the corner of my deck. The plastic is very lightweight, so most of the weight is in the soil you use to put in it. Waiting for my beans to come up. It looks as described.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice planter.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice for small places....we have strawberries planted... it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dana B

customer_reviews.title: Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the assembly process would have been super easy with another person. I love it and I planted my bulbs in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Hosmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Planter for Herbs
customer_reviews.text: The planter is very nice. Right now I have 2 rows of Herbs planted in it. I need to plant some more
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Crews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pots!
customer_reviews.text: I love this idea and this pot(s)! I wanted an herb garden year round so this was perfect. I planted 9 and I can grow herbs through the winter indoors. The chain did not come but that’s ok, too big in my opinion to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Tanura Moss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an herb garden.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my indoor herb garden! It is bigger than expected but I don't have to use all the tiers. Planter has been in my window getting morning and day sun it has not warped or faded!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: No chain included
customer_reviews.text: No the change is missing. Everything else was vacuum packed in plastic but no chain . Please ship ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brackins

customer_reviews.title: So so.
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy but tips over easy, also needs a heavier duty hook on the top, starts to bend and might break.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mann

customer_reviews.title: Lots of variety in a small distinctive space.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the flexibility of levels of planting. Distinctive design and can get a lot of variety in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift for my daughter, the gardener
customer_reviews.text: This useful planter has been outside in New Orleans for seven months and it looks as good as it did the day I gave it to her. She was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA MITCHELL

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to assemble, good and sturdy and for the price a bargain.....I am using for an herb garden.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Front porch flower arrangement
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. Makes a nice flower stand for the front porch .
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable!! Perfect for a small herb/spice garden!! You can plant 15 different herbs/spices in one of these towers! I bought 2 and I’m super excited to see how well the herbs grow!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Plant killer
customer_reviews.text: Been using 2 months in desert climate. Plants have not grown or have died in this planter. Other plants in other pots are flourishing. Not a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: lilacgal

customer_reviews.title: A must for herb lovers
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and my plants are doing great. I have more herbs this year and they are easier to care for in this system.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great planter
customer_reviews.text: We bought for inside herbs but found the grow light does not beam down past the first level. Will try strawberries outside. We still like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H

customer_reviews.title: There's got to be a better way!
customer_reviews.text: Once seedlings are planted, this planter had to constantly be turned to sunlight. It is also very difficult to water all compartments from the top and has to be turned to water throughout.
customer_reviews.author: TV in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Each pot sits in grooves on top of the other and could come apart if bumped. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharry

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, cute design
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to put together, nice that it comes with drainage rack. Hoping to grow strawberries
customer_reviews.author: Anna Moritomo

customer_reviews.title: A bit short, but works for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great Product & Super Fast Shipment! Thank You for Everything!!
customer_reviews.author: JGNYC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: The product I ordered was white. The product that arrived was terracotta. Not happy about the substitution.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Overall poor design
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy once assembled. No way to hang by one small chain. One side is always in shadow of the other unless outside in full sun. Loved the idea....just didn't work out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definite patio planter
customer_reviews.text: The water dish on the bottom warped some when not hung right away but otherwise really love the space saving feature for so many flowers and the look on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No information included!
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions or information of any kind. This was a gift and it was very disappointing for them to ask if I knew how it was to go together, and embarrassing to me to not be able to help them from across the country.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Nice planters
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Good size for my strawberry plants. The color is nice and the quality is good. I might get some more for vertical planting.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This products holds multiple plants and gives them plenty of room to grow. Makes watering very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Karilyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful garden, simple, elegant, I'm in love. Considering buying a second... : )
customer_reviews.author: bl8ck1c3

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wife was very happy! She was able to plant multiple different plants in one place without taking up alot of room, it's great. Second one is on the way!
customer_reviews.author: The helpful person in you're life ;p

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1 tier
customer_reviews.text: The description of the item is wrong. It arrived with a missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using them!
customer_reviews.text: It was great, except all four packages were missing the chain that was supposed to be included.
customer_reviews.author: Lynna Do

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to fully use, but seems like a great purchase. All fits nicely. Will pain then hang in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: jasdf3234

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received had black smudge marks on a few of the pots & I cannot get it off. I doesn't look very good with the smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Oman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Strawberries
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it showed up quickly and it was just as described. Perfect strawberry planter!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure everything is on the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the planters and did not receive the chain's.
customer_reviews.author: laura gallagher

customer_reviews.title: I love this planter
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my deck...l the way it looks...it's not cheapy looking at all. I'll be getting it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Holds plenty. We are going to put a 3/8" rod in the center so there is no chance it will blow over in the wind as it is rather big.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepers

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: While everything looked great, I received the wrong color twice. I ordered off white and they sent the terracotta. It’s truly a bummer because I was really excited about this planter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is compact and can fit in just about anywhere, good color choice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great planter
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Takes up little space for amount of plants you can grow. Used for an herb garden in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Stackable planter
customer_reviews.text: A little less sturdy than I would have liked, but a good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great item for yourself or to gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this planter for myself and my mom loved it so much I had to get her one also.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rogier

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I imaged alot of my herbs feel squeezed in
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Great invention.
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product. Can't wait to start growing my seedlings.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wise

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR HYDROPONIC STARTER
customer_reviews.text: IT IS COMPACT, HOLDS A LOT OF PLANTS, EASY WATERING, AND GREAT FOR THE NEW HYDROPONIC PEOPLE/PERSON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise C Berg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for herbs
customer_reviews.text: I can never resist trying to grow ALL the herbs I'm tempted to cook with, but that usually leads to a haphazard mess of little pots everywhere. I like this set-up because it is perfect for growing small quantities of many different kinds of plants in a compact space, which is ideal for a kitchen herb garden. I've already filled the first planter and I'm tempted to buy another so that I can continue to expand the range of culinary herbs ready to hand!
customer_reviews.author: Verre

customer_reviews.title: So cool for kitchen herbs!
customer_reviews.text: We've only filled 3 of the 5 layers and it looks amazing, already! Perfect for a quick transplant of pregrown herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelz129

customer_reviews.title: Great for strawberries!
customer_reviews.text: I planted bare root strawberries in my planter and hung it from the canopy on my patio. It looks lovely and takes up very little space! I may add a second one next spring for herbs or flowers. I also like the look of these versus the other brand of stackable planters. These just look like better quality to me. And I like the white color. I’ll mention that I had a difficult time threading he chain through the center hole in the planters. The holes are just slightly too small so I had to force it through each one. Kind of a pain, but it’s now stable and sturdy and looks great hung up!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Vertical garden with enough room to let your plants grow
customer_reviews.text: Great planter - comes very compact but opens up to product lots of space for various plants. Separators look like they will work well to drain the soil. Might have to get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely planter
customer_reviews.text: I got this to have a small place to grow some herbs this summer. My dog digs up half my yard so I was trying to find something that he would leave alone. These are very easy to use and I love that they have a tray at the bottom for extra water so you don’t get root rot. Very easy to install and comes with the ability to hang it too. Highly recommended. (The clothes pins are my identification of what I planted)
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Great Planter
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. I have filled it with strawberries with a few decorative plants I the large top bowl. I am very pleased. It is much better than a strawberry jar.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M

customer_reviews.title: very clever when you have limited space
customer_reviews.text: We planted our herbs in there. They were all alive and we had a different one in each section. The only problem is that the ones on the back side died for lack of sun. I still love this idea and it looks so much better than many pots sitting around. I hope to figure out what plants can prosper in the shady back spots.
customer_reviews.author: JSAAII

customer_reviews.title: great for hen and chicks, flowers and etc
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to put together. It is great for a lot of hen and chicks. It fit nicely on a table.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bates

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for small plants, not tall, not bulky.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for already started smaller plants. I tried flower seeds and had to separate the tower on some grow shelves to get them to grow. Not easy to efficiently water. I will be adding a bar though the center before I put it outdoors on my deck and will check into a mister setup to get coverage when watering.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works
customer_reviews.text: The thing kinda works as it says it will but I live fairly far north which means only one side gets enough sun, east and west sides get some sun but not very much especially in the Spring. I unstacked them, spread them out to be single pots and they are doing better with enough sun. As the sun gets closer to solstice it may work for three sides if it is stacked up again. Might work well in southern parts of northern hemisphere.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Multi level pot
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. It held my strawberries and they are off the ground. Put on a roller stand
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoors!
customer_reviews.text: This small vertical garden sits on a corner table in my apartment windows where it gets sunlight all day. I’m using it for growing herbs indoors. The color is great and does not clash with my indoor color scheme. The planters are perfect and so far I’ve planted green onions, chives, mint, basil, etc! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great planter
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Easy to put together. They just stack on top of each other. I would suggest that the bottom dish and lowest shelf be weighted heavier just to keep it stable. It hasn't tipped over, but I think a little more weight on th bottom would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with Multiple Flower Varieties!
customer_reviews.text: I love this planter for multiple flowers and it has made a beautiful display on my deck!
customer_reviews.author: BrendaP

customer_reviews.title: stackable vertical garden
customer_reviews.text: I like the compactness of the tower but not the fact that water runs to bottom, thus the top dries out quicker if stacked all together. I wish it was possible to order just the drip pan so when I separate couple of the tiers I can hang as well. It is very attractive tower.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpytoad

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: The planter is nice and compact and sturdy. It was easy to put together. I don't think the trickle down effect for watering is that effective, I water each section individually.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Planting Area is very Small
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have an overflowing flower planter, but after assembling, I just don't think it will look right. Ultimately it's about a 3" area that you have where the plant can actually grow.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Looks are deceiving, this is a large planter and more suitable for outdoor use than the indoor use by a window I was hoping for. It was doing great until attack cat decided thyme was his enemy. We will have to regroup in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Boe

customer_reviews.title: Patio herb garden
customer_reviews.text: I have an appartment patio and this works perfectly for me. I made an herb garden. It is a great size and was so easy to assemble and planted all my seeds in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Great vertical planter
customer_reviews.text: We love this stackable planter. Sometimes vertical is the only way to go and this does a great job and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Keene

customer_reviews.title: Stacks well. Retains water too well.
customer_reviews.text: Holds water too long. I have to dump excess water out after a hard rain. Creates a mosquito pond.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Marie

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I planted my strawberries in this planter. Super fast to put together, fill, plant, and water. Looks nice on my patio as well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Sponsel

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet but it looks good and quite neat in the house.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Nice planter
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Little planter for flowers and herbs! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: dennis may

customer_reviews.title: High quality planter
customer_reviews.text: This item was higher quality than expected for the price. It's attractive and sturdy. Using it for an indoor herb garden. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley H.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: I really like this new addition to my patio so far. I'm hoping there herbs and plants last in it.
customer_reviews.author: snickerd00dle

customer_reviews.title: Large planter
customer_reviews.text: Great overall planter, so far decided to keep disassembled, four stars bc very hard to supply light to each side if not at the top rung
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So much more than I was expecting. Love it. Planted my tea plants super excited.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

product_meta.title: Amazing Creation Stackable Planter Vertical Garden for Growing Strawberries, Herbs, Flowers, Vegetables and Succulents| Indoor/Outdoor 5 Tier Gardening Tower| Hanging Planter (Off-White)
feature_bullets: Stackable Herb Garden Planter- Our 5 tier stackable planter is perfect for holding up to 15 different plants, herbs or flowers. Our stacking pots help green thumbs save space when gardening indoors, outdoors, or on the balcony with vertical growing.

Vertical Tiered Planter- The multiple planter pots can be filled with high-quality soil and accommodate up to 5” plants to make it easier to mix and match your favorite plants including succulents, flowers, herbs, veggies, strawberries, greens and more.

Space-Saving Home Design- Ideal for growing fresh herbs in the kitchen or creating your own little balcony greenhouse in an apartment, this 5-tier stackable plastic planter makes it easier to stack, manage, water, and grow healthy plants in smaller living areas.

Simple Starter Kit for Beginners- Our modern tower planter makes it easy to create your own indoor mini herb garden, plant beautiful flowers, and more with a trickle-down system that helps conserve water and makes gardening fun for all ages.

Weather-Resistant and Durable- Crafted with a heavy-duty polypropylene plastic, these reusable elevated planters are fade and crack resistant to outlast hot summer days and inclement weather. Perfect for decks, patios, or porches.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars376 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
